title: Honor and Keys
body: Honor update is really cool but I have a question regarding keys.  In one place (I dont remember where) I heard that as you increased in honor levels, you got a higher drop chance for keys. Ive looked at other riot posts about the rewards of increasing in honor and they dont seem to mention higher drop rate in keys, so im wondering if there is or isnt. Thanks

replies.body: Been playing for the past 5 days since the honor update came out, not a single key fragment drop, and i use to get them quite a bit before the change, like 1 every 5-10 games.
What is the drop rate for keys at any level? I've noticed a serious drop in them since the system changed, not had one yet after 15-20 games.

I don't believe the drop rate for keys increase with your [**Honor level**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor), but those higher levels unlock other rewards like Honor Capsules and better loading screen flairs.
